ratings.comment: Amanda is the most empathetic professor I have ever come across. She was very accessible outside of class, despite having hundreds of students in her lecture. I went from almost failing midterms to getting a high A in the class because Amanda gave me the motivation and guidance I needed. She sets a great example for women in STEM. Best prof ever!
Best professor I've ever had, made ochem enjoyable and her lectures were entertaining; had her for ochem 1 and 2
This was my second semester with Dr. S and she is awesome. She makes learning ochem fun and approachable. Highly recommend her as a professor!
Great professor! Often made an effort in lecture to connect chemistry with modern, relevant, and funny topics which helped with memorization of difficult content.

The reason why I enjoyed/ succeeded in ochem! Her lectures were engaging made ppl her sections want to show up to class. HIGHLY recommend going to office hours, she used this time to explain what students didnt understand from class. Overall my favorite professor in college so far.
Amanda was awesome. Made the beast of ochem a little less ominous and frightening. Truly cares about her students. Funny and lighthearted, and very intelligent. Take her lecture if you can

Prof. Spiewak is obviously passionate about organic chemistry and her energy about ochem is contagious. It's difficult coming into ochem being positive but she made this class actually enjoyable. Grading curve makes it easy to succeed in the class but there is only 7 grades total. She easily breaks down this tough class into something comprehensive
Dr. Spiewak was an awesome professor. She brought a ton of excitement and energy to every single lecture and made learning orgo fun.

Definitely a great instructor that made ochem much more fun. Exams are in person and cumulative but not bad  but quizzes are online with a very restrictive time limit.  Personally I do have a hard time adapt online quizzes with a lots of drawing and explanation of concept.
be prepared, o-chem is a difficult class. Amanda was a great teacher though, very bubbly and entertaining, made lectures bearable.

Ochem is an extremely hard class but she did a good job of explaining. Definitely better than other professors. Super young, so she's understanding and very approachable, so she never makes you feel dumb when you ask questions. Office hours are helpful.
Good class, averages are high, pretty good teacher, lectures are a little boring though.

Professor Spiewak has made ochem so much easier and more fun than expected. She makes each lecture fun and explains everything in terms you can understand them in. Ochem is so much better with her and I believe my grade is so much better because of her lectures.

Dr. Spiewak is an amazing lecturer and really made ochem relatively easy to understand. Her lectures are fun, and she's good at explaining the important parts of each mechanism clearly. She's also easy to talk to during office hours and is patient when answering questions; would highly recommend her as a professor
Dr. Spiewak is an engaging lecturer with a passion for chemistry. She goes through the lecture material at a moderate pace, but is great at explaining things as she goes.
A amazing professor with fun and engaging lectures
